ControlBlock.Description: PI controller with output limitation: G(s) = Kp + Ki/s

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at initialization function call.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out set to 0 Enable 0->1: Preload of integral part Enable == 1: Activation of block

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

MaskParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

ControlBlock.Description: Calculates the filter coefficients for a second order lowpass and performs filtering on input signal. Second order transfer function used: H(z) = (b0.z + b1.z + b2) / (z + a1.z + a2)

MaskParameter.Name: characteristic
MaskParameter.Description: The filter characteristic is one of Butterworth, Chebyshev I, Chebyshev II (also known as inverse Chebyshev) or Bessel.

MaskParameter.Name: rp
MaskParameter.Description: The passband ripple is only used and verified with 'Chebyshev I' filters. Must be a positive number.

MaskParameter.Name: rs
MaskParameter.Description: The stopband ripple is only used and verified with 'Chebyshev II' filters. Must be a positive number.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ControlBlock.Description: Limitation of rising and falling rate. Function of Enable: 0: rate limiting disabled, signal is passed through 1: rate limiting enabled, signal is rate limited 0->1: preload of output with value from init input

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at rising flanke of enable signal.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to In. Enable != 0: Activation of block; Out is rate limited. Enable 0->1: Preloading of output; Out is set to value of Init input.

MaskParameter.Name: Tr
MaskParameter.Description: Rising time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tr.

MaskParameter.Name: Tf
MaskParameter.Description: Falling time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tf.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ControlBlock.Author: sfragner

ControlBlock.Description: PI controller with output limitation: G(s) = Kp + Ki/s

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at initialization function call.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out set to 0 Enable 0->1: Preload of integral part Enable == 1: Activation of block

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ControlBlock.Author: sfragner
